#summary gwt-cal project roadmap and release notes

= Roadmap =

  * Create Month view and List view
  * Add drag / drop to day view
  * Drag / drop prompts user to confirm desired change
  * Replace HasValue with ItemSelected ... more appropriate
  * Select appointment using arrow keys
  * Appointment double-click to fire event also
  * Handle Multi-day appointments

= Release Notes =

=== Version 0.8 ===
  * Day / multi-Day View
  * Configurable time intervals (15min,30min,1hr)
  * HasValue event fires when item selected
  * Add iCal, Google and Outlook themes
  * Fixed ie6 and ie7 opacity issues
  * Added drop shadow for ie6 and ie7
